title: Five New Films to Stream, ‘Top Gun: Maverick’ for Best Picture, and a Summer Movie Mailbag
description:
Sean shares five new films to stream (1:00) before opening up the mailbag to answer your questions and beat the summer doldrums (22:00).
Host: Sean Fennessey
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
